channel.title: ssaraf on ssaraf
channel.description: Recent content in ssaraf on ssaraf

item.title: About
item.description:
I grew up in Lake Charles, Louisiana, studied at Stanford, and now work in the tech industry. I started my career at Palantir, where I focused on healthcare and bio customers, but touched a few other industries, including oil & gas, insurance, and shipping.

Now I work on the product team at Benchling, where I spend most of my time on data products. I also run a few side businesses while working full time.

In person I’m a big jokester, and love to laugh. Over zoom I do my best robot impression.

I live in San Francisco, California. I look like this:

Thanks for reading!

item.title: Products
item.description:
I like to run profitable side businesses while working full time. Most people reading this blog got here from interactions with these businesses, or from twitter.

Sudopoint (sudopoint.com)

Sudopoint is a web platform for generating test datasets, primarily for software testers and demo’ers. We provide a no-code platform where users can buy datasets or pay a monthly subscription.

Getting Started with SQL (newline.co)

I’m writing a book on how to get started with PostgreSQL with Newline, a modern “O’Reilly like” publishing platform. As part of my book preparation, I taught a SQL class to the public in early 2021 and a Python class as part of Code in Place. I’m looking for more opportunities to teach SQL classes to folks in industry - if you’re interested, please get in touch!
